data.lyric:
[ti:Easy]
[ar:DaniLeigh]
[al:The Plan (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Easy - DaniLeigh
[00:04.42]Lyrics by：Danielle Curiel/Christopher Allen Clark/Fallon King/Mathias Sorum/Ronald M. Ferebee/Jr.
[00:08.84]Composed by：Danielle Curiel/Christopher Allen Clark/Fallon King/Mathias Sorum/Ronald M. Ferebee/Jr.
[00:13.26]Produced by：Christopher Allen Clark/Fallon King
[00:17.68]Yeah yeah
[00:19.53]Let me catch a vibe let's just take our time
[00:24.31]Just relax your mind and take it easy
[00:29.03]Don't have to decide you do I do I
[00:33.77]Don't have to be mine let's take it easy
[00:38.64]D**n we so fire babe
[00:40.45]We been through the 305 highway
[00:42.77]Love it how you ride in the fast lane
[00:45.10]Make me wanna say that's my bae
[00:47.62]Yeah
[00:48.22]Dani gotta behave gotta be chill like a Sunday
[00:52.41]Never wanna look too thirsty
[00:54.70]But your drip got me feeling wavy
[00:57.20]Make you feel lucky lucky
[00:59.65]Make you wanna love me love me
[01:01.96]Baby when you with me with me
[01:04.28]Got no worries worries
[01:06.76]I love it when you touch me touch me
[01:09.09]Feelin' so lovely lovely
[01:11.48]Make me wanna love me love me
[01:13.92]Make me feel lucky lucky
[01:17.31]Let me catch a vibe let's just take our time
[01:21.67]Just relax your mind and take it easy
[01:26.56]Don't have to decide you do I do I
[01:31.31]Don't have to be mine let's take it easy yeah
[01:39.52]Let's take it easy
[01:45.83]Never gotta OD
[01:47.63]I just wanna love you like a homie
[01:49.95]Make you feel love like that OG
[01:52.23]It could feel just like the old days
[01:54.63]Okay let's just be real
[01:57.17]I can tell you like how this feels
[01:59.43]Ain't no stress no mistakes
[02:01.87]Put in that work you gon' miss me
[02:03.79]Yeah yeah yeah
[02:04.72]Make you feel lucky lucky
[02:06.67]Make you wanna love me love me
[02:09.06]Baby when you with me with me
[02:11.46]Got no worries worries
[02:13.91]I love it when you touch me touch me
[02:16.23]Feelin' so lovely lovely
[02:18.65]Make me wanna love me love me
[02:21.06]Make me feel lucky lucky
[02:24.44]Let me catch a vibe let's just take our time
[02:28.86]Just relax your mind and take it easy
[02:33.77]Don't have to decide you do I do I
[02:38.57]Don't have to be mine let's take it easy yeah
[02:46.63]Let's take it easy
[02:51.29]Let's take it easy yeah
[02:56.23]Let's take it easy
data.trans:
[ti:Easy]
[ar:DaniLeigh]
[al:The Plan (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.42]//
[00:08.84]//
[00:13.26]//
[00:17.68]//
[00:19.53]让我凝神感受你的气息 我们尽情享受悠悠时光
[00:24.31]放逐心灵 脚步轻盈 
[00:29.03]不必急切做出决定 彼此舒心
[00:33.77]不必马上给我答案 我们细水长流 
[00:38.64]宝贝 我们如此惬意
[00:40.45]我们贯穿305公路 行云流水般畅通无阻 
[00:42.77]高速路段你大展身手的样子让我痴迷
[00:45.10]让我忍不住想拍手称快 那可是我家的宝贝
[00:47.62]//
[00:48.22]Dani要矜持 要高冷 像周日约会那样张弛有度
[00:52.41]不要一副寂寞难耐的样子
[00:54.70]但你英姿飒爽的风度 真让我心神荡漾
[00:57.20]得让你对我刮目相看 得到我便如获至宝 
[00:59.65]得让你对我心生爱慕
[01:01.96]宝贝 你和我在一起的时候
[01:04.28]我便无忧无虑 如沐春风
[01:06.76]我爱你温柔的轻抚
[01:09.09]感觉如此撩拨心弦
[01:11.48]让我觉得自己都更惹人爱怜了
[01:13.92]让我觉得如此幸运
[01:17.31]让我凝神感受你的气息 我们尽情享受悠悠时光
[01:21.67]放逐心灵 脚步轻盈
[01:26.56]不必急切做出决定 彼此舒心 
[01:31.31]不必马上给我答案 我们细水长流 
[01:39.52]细水长流 缓步慢行
[01:45.83]不会过度沉溺
[01:47.63]我会好好珍惜你好好爱你
[01:49.95]让你感受这独一无二的爱
[01:52.23]感觉就像是回到了往日时光
[01:54.63]好吧 让我们面对现实吧
[01:57.17]我可以告诉你这是什么感觉
[01:59.43]没有压力 不会犯错
[02:01.87]把精力放在工作上 你会想念我的
[02:03.79]//
[02:04.72]如获至宝般幸运
[02:06.67]让你对我心生爱慕
[02:09.06]宝贝 你和我在一起的时候
[02:11.46]我便无忧无虑 如沐春风
[02:13.91]我爱你温柔的轻抚
[02:16.23]感觉如此撩拨心弦
[02:18.65]让我觉得自己都更惹人爱怜了
[02:21.06]让我觉得如此幸运
[02:24.44]让我凝神感受你的气息 我们尽情享受悠悠时光
[02:28.86]放逐心灵 脚步轻盈
[02:33.77]不必急切做出决定 彼此舒心
[02:38.57]不必马上给我答案 我们细水长流 
[02:46.63]细水长流 缓步慢行
[02:51.29]我们细水长流
[02:56.23]细水长流 缓步慢行
